duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support in a complex environment, including addressing billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and providing support for the Farmers.com/Mobile app.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account-related questions from internal and external customers.
Proactively share knowledge to reduce customer effort and provide a positive customer experience.
Utilize technology and learning resources to deliver efficient problem resolution.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
